channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Kmap Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Kmap Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10293|2024-08-04T22:17:20.183Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20kmap%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Kmap Plugin in KmapJenkinsBuilder.DescriptorImpl form validation methods allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

item.title: CVE-2019-10292|2024-08-04T22:17:19.821Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20kmap%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Kmap Plugin in KmapJenkinsBuilder.DescriptorImpl form validation methods allows attackers to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

item.title: CVE-2019-10294|2024-08-04T22:17:19.843Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20kmap%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Kmap Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.
